skill.name: quality-report-generate
skill.description: Generate comprehensive quality report with metrics and verification. Produces final CHAPTER_XX_VERIFICATION.md and quality_metrics.json for deployment approval.
skill.summary: Generate comprehensive quality report with metrics and verification. Produces final CHAPTER_XX_VERIF...
skill.author: AbeJitsu

security_audit.summary: Documentation-only skill with no executable code. All 62 static findings are false positives from pattern matching on markdown syntax, relative paths, and hash identifiers. The skill describes a quality reporting process but does not perform file operations, network requests, or command execution. Safe for publication.

content.user_title: Generate Quality Reports for Content Deployment
content.value_statement: Manual quality review takes hours and risks missing critical validation issues. This skill aggregates all validation results, calculates comprehensive quality metrics, and produces deployment-ready reports automatically.
actual_capabilities: Aggregate validation results from structure and semantic validation gates
Calculate quality scores using weighted scoring algorithms
Generate human-readable markdown verification reports with status indicators
Create machine-readable JSON metrics for CI/CD pipeline integration
Provide deployment decisions based on configurable thresholds
Timestamp reports for audit trail and compliance tracking
limitations: Does not perform validation itself - requires input from previous validation gates
Does not execute Python scripts - documentation describes usage patterns only
Does not access external APIs or network services
Does not modify source files - generates output reports only

use_cases.title: Final deployment verification gate
use_cases.description: Generate comprehensive verification report aggregating all validation results before approving chapter deployment to production

use_cases.title: CI/CD quality gate integration
use_cases.description: Parse JSON metrics for automated quality dashboards, trend analysis, and deployment pipeline decisions

use_cases.title: Compliance audit documentation
use_cases.description: Create permanent audit records of validation status, quality scores, and deployment approvals for compliance requirements

prompt_templates.title: Basic quality report
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate quality report for chapter 5 using validation_structure.json, validation_semantic.json, consolidation_log.json, and chapter_05.html as inputs

prompt_templates.title: Custom quality thresholds
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate quality report with minimum overall score threshold of 90 and require visual accuracy above 85 percent for deployment approval

prompt_templates.title: Full validation pipeline
prompt_templates.prompt: Run complete quality gate pipeline: aggregate all validation artifacts, calculate comprehensive metrics, generate CHAPTER_05_VERIFICATION.md and quality_metrics.json output files

prompt_templates.title: Automated CI/CD integration
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate quality report for automated deployment decision. Output only JSON metrics with pass/fail status for continuous integration pipeline processing

output: Structure Validation: 100 percent compliance - all checks passed
Semantic Validation: 98 percent compliance - minor warnings only
Content Completeness: 100 percent - all sections verified
Visual Accuracy: 94 percent similarity to original PDF
Output files created: CHAPTER_03_VERIFICATION.md and quality_metrics.json

output_examples.input: Check if chapter 7 meets deployment thresholds
output: Semantic: WARN - 3 missing CSS classes found
Recommendation: Manual review required before deployment
Review markdown report for detailed findings and remediation steps

best_practices: Run quality-report-generate after all validation gates have completed to ensure comprehensive data aggregation
Review the human-readable markdown report before deployment to understand quality context and any warnings
Use JSON metrics output for automated CI/CD quality gate decisions and trend tracking dashboards
anti_patterns: Running quality-report-generate before validation gates complete results in incomplete or missing metrics
Ignoring warnings in the quality report can lead to deployment of suboptimal content
Skipping manual review for high-stakes or customer-facing content increases risk of quality issues

faq.question: What AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. It is documentation-only and describes quality report generation processes.

faq.question: What are the default quality thresholds?
faq.answer: Default thresholds are 85 for overall score, 100 for structure validation, 90 for semantic compliance, and 85 for visual accuracy.

faq.question: Can this skill integrate with CI/CD pipelines?
faq.answer: Yes. The JSON output format is specifically designed for automated parsing, quality gate decisions, and integration with continuous deployment pipelines.

faq.question: Is my data secure when using this skill?
faq.answer: This is a documentation-only skill with no executable code. It describes quality report generation but does not access, process, or transmit any user data.

faq.question: Why is my quality score lower than expected?
faq.answer: Low scores typically result from structure errors, missing semantic CSS classes, incomplete content coverage, or visual accuracy issues. Review the detailed markdown report for specific findings.

faq.question: How does this differ from validation skills?
faq.answer: Quality-report-generate is the final aggregation step. It combines results from all previous validation gates into comprehensive deployment-ready reports and metrics.
